content: **materials** baby cotton crochet hook 3 mm 15 mm button **yarn usage** approx 20g **gauge** 24 sts x 10 row = 10 x 10 cm **abbreviations** chain chain stitch st s stitch es magic_ring magic_ring double_crochet double_crochet bl back loop of stitch single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch
